ygData.messageBody:
The best combo? Man this would be so cool to, here it goes, GNOME MONK!!!!
Tell me it wouldn't be just too cool to see the flying kick from a little
gnome in solid black leather. I also think that a Gnome Shadow Knight is in
order as they can be both warriors and necro's. Gnome Paladin as well for
the same reason.


Mu
Loves Gnomes
-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 1:37 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: An idea...



Thanks!
Now if we can just convince Verant...
luv,
-Su

> That is a very good idea! I think anyways ;) I like the idea of the
different haircolors and that they could be bards. I think DE (or DWE) bards
would be cool.
>
> Hallie
